episodes.title: Swapping Through Time | TimeSwap | Ricsson Ngo, Harshita Singh, Ameeth Devadas | Polygon Alpha Pod
episodes.description: Decentralized and oracle-less fixed time preference protocol. Lend and borrow without the use of oracles

episodes.title: The Emergence of Crypto Intelligence | Arkham Intelligence | Miguel Morel | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Today we are joined by Miguel Morel, the CEO of Arkham Intelligence, an early-stage startup at the forefront of the rapidly expanding crypto intelligence industry.

episodes.title: Risk-Aware DAO Treasury Management | Aera | Tarun Chitra | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Aera is the world’s first autonomous, data-driven treasury management protocol. Hedge risk to grow safely.

episodes.title: Staking Incentives for Uniswap V3 | Revert Finance | Mario Zavala | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Revert is incentivizing 8 Uniswap V3 pools on Polygon with 150k MATIC over 28 days, ending on December 21.

episodes.title: Democratizing Work with DAOs in Web3 | Opolis | John Paller | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Opolis celebrates your independence while providing the employee benefits you need.

episodes.title: A Self-custody Wallet for Web3 Citizens | Alexander Guy | Zerion | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Zerion Wallet is a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet that secure open source technologies and lets you stay in control of your private keys and seedphrase.

episodes.title: The DeFi UI/UX Wallet Revolution | Giddy | Eric Parker & Ethan Parker | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: The self-custody, recoverable crypto wallet that connects users to passive income earning opportunities with crypto.

episodes.title: Win By Saving & DeFi Composability | PoolTogether | Leighton Cusack | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: PoolTogether is a prize savings protocol, enabling you to win by saving. Every dollar you deposit gives you a chance to win prizes.

episodes.title: An Unreal Primer on Real World Assets | TJ Ragsdale & Jack Chong | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Since the genesis of smart-contract blockchains, entrepreneurs have sought to bring real world assets (RWAs) on-chain.

episodes.title: Cross Chain DeFi Borrowing Aggregation | Fuji Protocol | Boyan & Daigaro | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: DeFi Lending and Borrowing Aggregator. The borrowing markets in DeFi are still maturing, and the infrastructure that will make the market liquid and fluid is still being built

episodes.title: The Web3 Connectivity Problem | API3 | Dave Connor & Ashar Shahid | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: First-party oracles are the next-generation technology to access off-chain data. API3 is leading the movement from legacy third-party oracle networks to first-party oracle solutions

episodes.title: Importance of Oracles in DeFi | Tellor Oracle Protocol | Nicholas Fett | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: First-party oracles are the next-generation technology to access off-chain data. API3 is leading the movement from legacy third-party oracle networks to first-party oracle solutions.

episodes.title: What is DeFi Lending 2.0? | 0VIX Protocol | Garry Krugljakow & Daniele Pinna | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: The next evolutionary step in money-market protocols. 0VIX’s elegant technology, smart tokenomics and frictionless UX makes DeFi lending future-proof and attractive to all users.

episodes.title: Unsecured Institutional Lending in DeFi | Clearpool | Rob Alcorn | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Clearpool allows institutions to borrow funds from a decentralized network of lenders without the need for collateral.

episodes.title: World's Largest Crypto Index Fund | Bitwise | Matt Hougan & Ryan Rasmussen | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Bitwise offers a suite of index-based crypto funds, including Decentralized Finance (DeFi), “blue-chip” NFT art & collectibles, and large-cap cryptocurrencies

episodes.title: Liquid Staking on Polygon with MaticX | Stader Labs | Amit Gajjala | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: Stader is a non-custodial smart contract-based staking platform that helps users conveniently discover & access staking solutions. Building key staking middleware infra for multiple PoS networks.

episodes.title: Improving DeFi User Experience with Push Notifications | EPNS | Harsh & Richa | Polygon Alpha Podcast
episodes.description: EPNS is the native communication protocol of Web3. A protocol for blockchain based notifications that are chain agnostic, platform independent, and incentivized!

episodes.title: The Decentralized VPN | Orchid Protocol | Travis Cannell
episodes.description: Orchid is a platform that enables a decentralized onion routing network incentivized by the OXT token and a multi-hop VPN client. Orchid believes in open-source software and privacy.

episodes.title: Bringing Privacy to DeFi | Railgun Protocol | Alan Scott
episodes.description: RAILGUN is bringing (much-needed) privacy to the Ethereum & Polygon Networks.

episodes.title: Building with the ERC-4626 Standard | mStable | Dimitri Goleko
episodes.description: mStable is an autonomous and non-custodial infrastructure for pegged-value crypto assets. A secure savings layer built for DeFi. Building on ERC-4626

episodes.title: Using Stablecoins in DeFi | QiDAO | Ben & Pablo
episodes.description: QiDao's hope is to make a stablecoin, MAI, that can help any crypto community member use their tokens as collateral, serving as a catalyst for DeFi innovation on Polygon.

episodes.title: Self-custody & the DeFi Mullet Thesis | Streams | Kieran Daniels
episodes.description: Self-custody is important! Streams is built on Ethereum which is a decentralized network and the backend is powered by Idle Finance; Gnosis Safe; Polygon Network; and Wyre

episodes.title: Cross-Chain Optimistic Oracles Bridges | UMA & Across Protocol | Hart Lambur
episodes.description: UMA is an optimistic oracle and dispute arbitration system. Across allows users to move tokens between chains by leveraging UMA's optimistic oracle technology.

episodes.title: Understanding Layer 2 Risks | L2BEAT | Bartek Kiepuszewski
episodes.description: L2BEAT provides transparent & verifiable insights into emerging layer two (L2) technologies which, in line with the rollup-centric Ethereum scaling roadmap, are aimed at scaling Ethereum

episodes.title: Governance, Multi-sigs, & Scaling in DeFi | Synthetix | Kain Warwick
episodes.description: Synthetix is a decentralized synthetic asset issuance protocol built on Ethereum. These synthetic assets are collateralized by the Synthetix Network Token (SNX)

episodes.title: Impermanent Loss Protection & Single-Sided Staking | Bancor | Mark Richardson
episodes.description: Bancor is a decentralized network of on-chain automated market makers (AMMs) supporting instant, low-cost trading, as well as Single-Sided Staking and 100% Impermanent Loss Protection.
